thread.title: Union Pacific Railroad announces bigger role for man at the top
thread.title_full: Union Pacific Railroad announces bigger role for man at the top

author: eTN Editor
title: Union Pacific Railroad announces bigger role for man at the top
text:
Union Pacific Railroad announces bigger role for man at the top Adv: Lance M. Fritz Adv: 
OMAHA, Nebraska - Union Pacific Railroad's board of directors today elected a new chairman, president and chief executive officer effective October 1.
